content.original: The Hellespont Lite Stealth Armor integrates Stealth Technology with Ferro Fibrous, Granting Superior Recon and Stealth Abilities. Reserves 2 slot in every Location except the Head.
content.prevOriginal: The Hellespont Lite Stealth Armor integrates Stealth Technology with Ferro Fibrous, Granting Superior Recon and Stealth Abilities. Reserves 2 slot in every Location except the Head.
content.content: 赫勒海精简隐身装甲将隐身技术和纤维钢结合在一起,提供卓越的侦查和隐身能力.除头部外每个部位占用2槽位.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更难被发现和侦测

content.original: Anti-Penetrative Ablation Armor was developed by the Draconis Combine to specifically defeat Armor Piercing Ammuntion and Tandem-Charge Warheads. This was accomplished by adding a second layer of "ribbed" steel below the standard armor plate. Though effective against armor piercing ammunition of all types, the ribbed steel has no effect on standard autocannon ammunition, energy weapons, or physical attacks.
content.prevOriginal: Anti-Penetrative Ablation Armor was developed by the Draconis Combine to specifically defeat Armor Piercing Ammuntion and Tandem-Charge Warheads. This was accomplished by adding a second layer of "ribbed" steel below the standard armor plate. Though effective against armor piercing ammunition of all types, the ribbed steel has no effect on standard autocannon ammunition, energy weapons, or physical attacks.
content.content: 反侵彻烧蚀装甲是由天龙联合体研制的,专门用于对抗穿甲弹药和串联装药弹头.通过在标准装甲板下方添加第二层'肋'钢来实现.尽管对所有类型的穿甲弹药都有效,但肋钢对标准自动火炮弹药、能量武器或物理攻击没有额外效果.

content.original: Ferro-Fibrous armor (FF) is a special type of armor used by vehicles and BattleMechs. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle.
content.prevOriginal: Ferro-Fibrous armor (FF) is a special type of armor used by vehicles and BattleMechs. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle.
content.content: 纤维钢(FF)装甲是车辆和战斗机甲使用的特殊类型装甲.使用钢、钛合金和碳纳米管纤维编织而成,提高了装甲板的强度,同等重量下比标准装甲提供了更多的防护,但是占用机甲和车辆的空间也更多.

content.original: Heat-Dissipating Armor is a derivative of the Fire-Resistant Armor used by Clan battlesuits. Created by the Capellan Confederation, it reduces the effects of fire and incendiary weapons on a BattleMech's heat exchange system while intact. Unlike some specialty armors, it is effective against most weapons, but the increased bulk of the armor (from additional insulation and modified sealants) results in less overall protection per ton.
content.prevOriginal: Heat-Dissipating Armor is a derivative of the Fire-Resistant Armor used by Clan battlesuits. Created by the Capellan Confederation, it reduces the effects of fire and incendiary weapons on a BattleMech's heat exchange system while intact. Unlike some specialty armors, it is effective against most weapons, but the increased bulk of the armor (from additional insulation and modified sealants) results in less overall protection per ton.
content.content: 散热装甲是氏族战斗服使用的耐火装甲的衍生物.由卡佩兰联邦发明,在完好无损的情况下,可以降低开火或燃烧武器对机甲换热系统的影响.和一些特专用装甲不同,它对大多数武器都有效,但装甲体积的增大(来自额外的隔热材料和改进密封剂)导致单位重量下防护能力降低.

content.original: Heavy Ferro-Fibrous armor was developed by Durallex for the Lyran Alliance based on the Inner Sphere's attempts at Light Ferro-Fibrous. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle.
content.prevOriginal: Heavy Ferro-Fibrous armor was developed by Durallex for the Lyran Alliance based on the Inner Sphere's attempts at Light Ferro-Fibrous. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle.
content.content: 重型纤维钢(FF)装甲由杜拉莱克斯为天琴同盟国研发,基于内天体对轻型纤维钢的尝试.使用钢、钛合金和碳纳米管纤维编织而成,提高了装甲板的强度,同等重量下比标准装甲提供了更多的防护,但是占用机甲和车辆的空间也更多.

content.original: Impact Resistant Armor was originally developed by Lyran Commonwealth engineers for use on Solaris VII and other gladiatorial combat worlds. The armor consists of a flexible sealant that covers interlocking rings, covered by a thick flexible outer shell similar to tank treads. These rings flex when hit by a 'Mech sized melee weapon, reducing the damage. Despite being effective against physical weapons, the armor's flexibility means it is more likely to fail against armor-piercing ammunition and in hostile environments. Reserves 6 slots.
content.prevOriginal: Impact Resistant Armor was originally developed by Lyran Commonwealth engineers for use on Solaris VII and other gladiatorial combat worlds. The armor consists of a flexible sealant that covers interlocking rings, covered by a thick flexible outer shell similar to tank treads. These rings flex when hit by a 'Mech sized melee weapon, reducing the damage. Despite being effective against physical weapons, the armor's flexibility means it is more likely to fail against armor-piercing ammunition and in hostile environments. Reserves 6 slots.
content.content: 抗冲击装甲最初由天琴同盟国的工程师开发,被索拉里斯VII或其他角斗士战斗世界使用.装甲由互锁环和覆盖在上面的柔性密封剂组成,由类似于坦克履带板的柔性外壳包裹.这些锁环在受到近战武器冲击时会弯曲以缓冲伤害.尽管该装甲对实体近战武器很有效,但活动的装甲也意味着难以在战斗环境中对抗穿甲弹药.占用6槽位.

content.original: All incoming Melee damage reduced, extra Melee Damage.

content.content: 降低即将到来的近战伤害和额外近战伤害.

content.original: Light Ferro-Fibrous armor (FF) is an attempt by the Inner Sphere to mimic SLDF Ferro-Fibrous armor. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle.
content.prevOriginal: Light Ferro-Fibrous armor (FF) is an attempt by the Inner Sphere to mimic SLDF Ferro-Fibrous armor. Utilizing a weave of ferro-steel, ferro-titanium, and diamond weave fibers which boosts the tensile strength of the plating, it provides more protection per ton than standard armor, but takes up more space on the 'Mech or vehicle.
content.content: 轻型纤维钢(FF)装甲是内天体模仿星联防卫军(SLDF)纤维钢装甲的一种尝试.使用钢、钛合金和碳纳米管纤维编织而成,提高了装甲板的强度,同等重量下比标准装甲提供了更多的防护,但是占用机甲和车辆的空间也更多.

content.original: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Stealth Armor is a modern day equivalent of the Star League era Null Signature System. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Stealth Armor is a modern day equivalent of the Star League era Null Signature System. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 由卡佩兰联邦开发的隐身装甲相当于星联时代零信号系统.除头部外的每个部位占用1个槽位并且需要ECM.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth

content.original: Seeing the Stealth Armor made by the Capellan Confederation on the invasions, the Society took into researching and equipping it with clan technology. Used mostly on experimental low cost stealth units. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Seeing the Stealth Armor made by the Capellan Confederation on the invasions, the Society took into researching and equipping it with clan technology. Used mostly on experimental low cost stealth units. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM. CASE Enabled
content.content: 见到卡佩兰联邦在氏族入侵时期制造的隐身装甲,氏族科学家学会开始研究并融合氏族科技.主要用于实验低成本隐身单位.占用6槽位并且需要ECM. 启用CASE

content.original: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Superheavy Stealth Armor is an attempt to give stealth capabilities to the massive 'Mechs. Reserves 12 slots and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Superheavy Stealth Armor is an attempt to give stealth capabilities to the massive 'Mechs. Reserves 12 slots and requires an ECM.

content.original: Active Camouflage Systems can be added to a existing Stealth Armour giving it Mimetic capabilities. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires a Stealth Armour.
content.prevOriginal: Active Camouflage Systems can be added to a existing Stealth Armour giving it Mimetic capabilities. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires a Stealth Armour.
content.content: 主动伪装系统能被添加到现有的隐身装甲中,使其获得伪装能力.在除头部外的每个部位占用1位,需要隐身装甲.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更被肉眼看到

content.original: Hardened Armor is a thicker armor type that uses multiple overlapping plates to provide additional protection against enemy fire. Though capable of diverting more damage than standard armor, the increased number of armor plates and their lack of flexibility makes any unit employing it more difficult to pilot, and can affect the speed as well. In fact, Hardened Armor is so heavy that it cannot be mounted on hovercraft, VTOLs, or WiGE vehicles. Reduces incoming Critical Hits.
content.prevOriginal: Hardened Armor is a thicker armor type that uses multiple overlapping plates to provide additional protection against enemy fire. Though capable of diverting more damage than standard armor, the increased number of armor plates and their lack of flexibility makes any unit employing it more difficult to pilot, and can affect the speed as well. In fact, Hardened Armor is so heavy that it cannot be mounted on hovercraft, VTOLs, or WiGE vehicles. Reduces incoming Critical Hits.
content.content: 硬化装甲是一种较厚的装甲类型,它使用了多个叠加的装甲板为抵御敌人的火力提供额外防护.虽然能够承受比标准装甲更多的伤害,但过多的装甲板数量和缺少灵活性使得使用它的任何单位都更难驾驶,事实上,硬化装甲非常重,无法安装在气垫船、VTOL或地效飞行器上.降低即将到来的严重损伤.

content.original: A precursor to the Void Signature System, the Mimetic Armor allows a unit to visually meld with its surroundings, making it harder to spot and track in battle. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: A precursor to the Void Signature System, the Mimetic Armor allows a unit to visually meld with its surroundings, making it harder to spot and track in battle. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 伪装装甲是零信号系统的前身,它可以让一个单位在视觉上与周围环境融合,使其在战斗中更难以发现和跟踪.在除头部外的每一个部位占1槽位,需要ECM.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更被肉眼看到

content.original: The Null Signature System is another Capelan endeavour to recreate lost Star League ECM. An upgraded Stealth Armour allows this to reduce incoming hits and trades heat generation for a reduced sensor and target signature. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: The Null Signature System is another Capelan endeavour to recreate lost Star League ECM. An upgraded Stealth Armour allows this to reduce incoming hits and trades heat generation for a reduced sensor and target signature. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 零信号系统(NSS)是卡佩兰联邦为了重现失落的星联ECM做出的一项努力.升级的隐形装甲可以减少敌人攻击的命中率,以产生热量为代价来降低传感器信号特征.在除头部外每个部位占用1个槽位,需要ECM.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更难被发现和侦测

content.original: A typical deep Periphery derivate of Impact Resistant and Hardened Armor with a twist of the Lyran Solaris Spikes, covering the whole Mech in additional interlocking hardened Spikes to give it an edge during the grittiest of infighting at cost of armor weight.
content.prevOriginal: A typical deep Periphery derivate of Impact Resistant and Hardened Armor with a twist of the Lyran Solaris Spikes, covering the whole Mech in additional interlocking hardened Spikes to give it an edge during the grittiest of infighting at cost of armor weight.
content.content: 一种典型的抗冲击和硬化装甲的深空外围衍生品,使用了天琴座索拉里斯星尖刺,交错硬化的尖刺在外部覆盖了整部机体,以过高的装甲重量为代价,为最激烈的角斗中带来优势.

content.original: The Void Signature System is a hybrid evolution of Star League era systems such as the Chameleon Light Polarization Shield and the Null Signature System. Essentially a scaled up version of the Battle Suits Mimetic Armor, the Void Signature System shields a BattleMech's presence from both visual and electronic detection with help from a paired ECM suite.  Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: The Void Signature System is a hybrid evolution of Star League era systems such as the Chameleon Light Polarization Shield and the Null Signature System. Essentially a scaled up version of the Battle Suits Mimetic Armor, the Void Signature System shields a BattleMech's presence from both visual and electronic detection with help from a paired ECM suite.  Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 空白信号系统(VSS)是星联时代系统的混血进化,如变色龙偏光护盾和零信号系统.本质上是战斗服隐身装甲的放大版,空白信号系统在配套的ECM套件的帮助下,保护战斗机甲的存在免受视觉和电信号检测到.在除头部外的部位占用1个槽位.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更被肉眼看到

content.original: Ballistic-Reinforced Armor was as a response to autocannon and missile weapons. The armor is a combination of Hardened and Reactive Armor that reduce damage taken from ballistic and missile weapons. The armor is also known as ''reinforced'' armor, but many techs use the term ''hardened light'' to describe it. A thinner version of hardened armor is backed by cable mesh that warps and traps missile and ballistic ammunition.
content.prevOriginal: Ballistic-Reinforced Armor was as a response to autocannon and missile weapons. The armor is a combination of Hardened and Reactive Armor that reduce damage taken from ballistic and missile weapons. The armor is also known as ''reinforced'' armor, but many techs use the term ''hardened light'' to describe it. A thinner version of hardened armor is backed by cable mesh that warps and traps missile and ballistic ammunition.
content.content: 弹道强化装甲是为了对抗自动加农炮和导弹武器.这种装甲是硬化装甲和反应装甲的组合,可以减少弹道武器和导弹武器的伤害.这种装甲也被称为"强化"装甲,但许多技术人员使用"轻型硬化"来描述它,它是一种由钢缆网支撑的薄版硬化装甲,能扭曲和捕捉导弹和弹道弹药.

content.original: The Void Signature System is a hybrid evolution of Star League era systems such as the Chameleon Light Polarization Shield and the Null Signature System. Essentially a scaled up version of the Battle Suits Mimetic Armor, the Void Signature System shields a BattleMech's presence from both visual and electronic detection with help from a paired ECM suite.  Reserves 2 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: The Void Signature System is a hybrid evolution of Star League era systems such as the Chameleon Light Polarization Shield and the Null Signature System. Essentially a scaled up version of the Battle Suits Mimetic Armor, the Void Signature System shields a BattleMech's presence from both visual and electronic detection with help from a paired ECM suite.  Reserves 2 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 空白信号系统(VSS)是星联时代系统的混血进化,如变色龙偏光护盾和零信号系统.本质上是战斗服隐身装甲的放大版,空白信号系统在配套的ECM套件的帮助下,保护战斗机甲的存在免受视觉和电信号检测到.在除头部外的部位占用2个槽位.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更被肉眼看到

content.original: Reactive Armor Plating (sometimes called Blazer Armor) is a type of specialized armor that uses a series of microscopic explosions to reduce the effects of explosive weapons fire like missiles, artillery, and mortars. Reserves 10 slots.
content.prevOriginal: Reactive Armor Plating (sometimes called Blazer Armor) is a type of specialized armor that uses a series of microscopic explosions to reduce the effects of explosive weapons fire like missiles, artillery, and mortars. Reserves 10 slots.
content.content: 反应装甲(也称燃烧装甲)是一种特殊装甲,使用一系列微型爆炸来减少导弹、自动炮和迫击炮等爆炸性武器攻击的影响.占用10个槽位.

content.original: Laser Reflective Armor dissipates energy weapon attacks more efficiently than other armor types, reducing the amount of damage taken by the 'Mech mounting it. Despite the name, Laser Reflective Armor is effective against all energy weapons, not just lasers. PPCs, Flamers, and Plasma Rifles and Cannons are all less effective against it. Reserves 10 slots.
content.prevOriginal: Laser Reflective Armor dissipates energy weapon attacks more efficiently than other armor types, reducing the amount of damage taken by the 'Mech mounting it. Despite the name, Laser Reflective Armor is effective against all energy weapons, not just lasers. PPCs, Flamers, and Plasma Rifles and Cannons are all less effective against it. Reserves 10 slots.
content.content: 激光反射装甲可以比其他类型装甲更有效的对付能量武器,减少了安装它机甲所受的能量武器伤害.尽管名称不同,激光反射装甲对所有能量武器都有效,而不仅仅是激光.它对PPC、火焰喷射器、等离子线膛炮和加农炮的防御效果比较差.占用10槽位.

content.original: Developed alongside the Stealth Armor do allow these Systems to be added to Mimetic Armors granting them Defense against being Detected by most Sensors. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires a Mimetic Armor.
content.prevOriginal: Developed alongside the Stealth Armor do allow these Systems to be added to Mimetic Armors granting them Defense against being Detected by most Sensors. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires a Mimetic Armor.
content.content: 与隐身装甲一起开发,可以将该系统添加到伪装装甲中,使其能够抵御大多数传感器的探测器.在除头部外的每个部位占用1槽位.需要伪装装甲.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更难被发现和侦测

content.original: Hard hits can break pieces off the inside of armor, without piercing it, turning them into shrapnel. This reinforced lining material slows or catches this spall before it can cause damage. Effectively reduces the chance of taking a Through Armor Critical hit. Reserves 2 slots.
content.prevOriginal: Hard hits can break pieces off the inside of armor, without piercing it, turning them into shrapnel. This reinforced lining material slows or catches this spall before it can cause damage. Effectively reduces the chance of taking a Through Armor Critical hit. Reserves 2 slots.
content.content: 重击可以在不击穿装甲的情况下将装甲内层震成破片.这种强化衬里材料在承受伤害之前会减缓或捕捉这种碎片.有效降低遭受碎甲重击的机率.占用两个槽位.

content.original: Active Camouflage Systems can be added to a existing Stealth Armour giving it Mimetic capabilities. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires a Stealth Armour.
content.prevOriginal: Active Camouflage Systems can be added to a existing Stealth Armour giving it Mimetic capabilities. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires a Stealth Armour.
content.content: 主动伪装系统能被添加到现有的隐身装甲中,使其获得伪装能力.在除头部外的每个部位占用1位,需要隐身装甲.

content.original: The Hellespont Lite Stealth Armor integrates Stealth Technology with Ferro Fibrous, Granting Superior Recon and Stealth Abilities. Reserves 2 slot in every Location except the Head.
content.prevOriginal: The Hellespont Lite Stealth Armor integrates Stealth Technology with Ferro Fibrous, Granting Superior Recon and Stealth Abilities. Reserves 2 slot in every Location except the Head.
content.content: 赫勒海精简隐身装甲将隐身技术和纤维钢结合在一起,提供卓越的侦查和隐身能力.除头部外每个部位占用2槽位.

content.original: A precursor to the Void Signature System, the Mimetic Armor allows a unit to visually meld with its surroundings, making it harder to spot and track in battle. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: A precursor to the Void Signature System, the Mimetic Armor allows a unit to visually meld with its surroundings, making it harder to spot and track in battle. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 拟态装甲是零信号系统的前身,它可以让一个单位在视觉上与周围环境融合,使其在战斗中更难以发现和跟踪.在除头部外的每一个部位占1槽位,需要ECM.

content.original: The Null Signature System is another Capelan endeavour to recreate lost Star League ECM. An upgraded Stealth Armour allows this to reduce incoming hits and trades heat generation for a reduced sensor and target signature. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: The Null Signature System is another Capelan endeavour to recreate lost Star League ECM. An upgraded Stealth Armour allows this to reduce incoming hits and trades heat generation for a reduced sensor and target signature. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM.
content.content: 零信号系统(NSS)是卡普兰为了重现失落的星联ECM做出的一项努力.升级的隐形装甲可以减少敌人攻击的命中率,比以产生热量为代价来减少传感器和信号特征.占用6槽位,需要ECM.

content.original: Developed alongside the Stealth Armor do allow these Systems to be added to Mimetic Armors granting them Defense against being Detected by most Sensors. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires a Mimetic Armor.
content.prevOriginal: Developed alongside the Stealth Armor do allow these Systems to be added to Mimetic Armors granting them Defense against being Detected by most Sensors. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires a Mimetic Armor.
content.content: 与隐身装甲一起开发,可以将该系统添加到拟态装甲中,使其能够抵御大多数传感器的探测.在除头部外的每个部位占用1槽位.需要拟态装甲.

content.original: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Stealth Armor is a modern day equivalent of the Star League era Null Signature System. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Stealth Armor is a modern day equivalent of the Star League era Null Signature System. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM.
content.content: 由卡佩兰联邦开发,隐身装甲是相当于星联时代零信号系统.占用6槽位.需要ECM.

content.original: Seeing the Stealth Armor made by the Capellan Confederation on the invasions, the Society took into researching and equipping it with clan technology. Used mostly on experimental low cost stealth units. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Seeing the Stealth Armor made by the Capellan Confederation on the invasions, the Society took into researching and equipping it with clan technology. Used mostly on experimental low cost stealth units. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM. CASE Enabled
content.content: 见到卡佩兰联邦在氏族入侵时期制造的隐身装甲,氏族科学家学会开始研究并融合氏族科技.主要用于实验低成本隐身单位.占用6槽位并且需要ECM. 启用CASE

content.original: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Superheavy Stealth Armor is an attempt to give stealth capabilities to the massive 'Mechs. Reserves 12 slots and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Superheavy Stealth Armor is an attempt to give stealth capabilities to the massive 'Mechs. Reserves 12 slots and requires an ECM.
content.content: 超重型隐身装甲是由卡佩兰联邦开发的,它试图赋予重型机甲隐身能力.占用12槽位并且需要ECM.

content.original: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Superheavy Stealth Armor is an attempt to give stealth capabilities to the massive 'Mechs. Reserves 12 slots and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Capellan Confederation, Superheavy Stealth Armor is an attempt to give stealth capabilities to the massive 'Mechs. Reserves 12 slots and requires an ECM.
content.content: 超重型隐身装甲是由卡佩兰联邦开发的,它试图赋予重型机甲隐身能力.占用12槽位并且需要ECM.

content.original: The Void Signature System is a hybrid evolution of Star League era systems such as the Chameleon Light Polarization Shield and the Null Signature System. Essentially a scaled up version of the Battle Suits Mimetic Armor, the Void Signature System shields a BattleMech's presence from both visual and electronic detection with help from a paired ECM suite.  Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: The Void Signature System is a hybrid evolution of Star League era systems such as the Chameleon Light Polarization Shield and the Null Signature System. Essentially a scaled up version of the Battle Suits Mimetic Armor, the Void Signature System shields a BattleMech's presence from both visual and electronic detection with help from a paired ECM suite.  Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM.
content.content: 空白信号系统(VSS)是星联时代系统的混血进化,如变色龙偏光护盾和零信号系统.本质上战斗服隐身装甲的放大版,空白信号系统在配套的ECM套件的帮助下,保护战斗机甲的存在免受视觉和电信号检测.占用6槽位.需要ECM

content.original: The Void Signature System is a hybrid evolution of Star League era systems such as the Chameleon Light Polarization Shield and the Null Signature System. Essentially a scaled up version of the Battle Suits Mimetic Armor, the Void Signature System shields a BattleMech's presence from both visual and electronic detection with help from a paired ECM suite.  Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: The Void Signature System is a hybrid evolution of Star League era systems such as the Chameleon Light Polarization Shield and the Null Signature System. Essentially a scaled up version of the Battle Suits Mimetic Armor, the Void Signature System shields a BattleMech's presence from both visual and electronic detection with help from a paired ECM suite.  Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM.
content.content: 空白信号系统(VSS)是星联时代系统的混血进化,如变色龙偏光护盾和零信号系统.本质上战斗服隐身装甲的放大版,空白信号系统在配套的ECM套件的帮助下,保护战斗机甲的存在免受视觉和电信号检测.占用6槽位.需要ECM
